description: It's a hot day in the city and two guys are hanging out on the street talking about going to the beach.  However, before they head out Mark and Lee Ryder approach them and force them into the back alley.  After putting up a strong effort the two are forced to do as they are told by the stronger two.  They leave the alley taking a new friend with them and the other drenched in cum on a trash can.
title: Huge #1, Scene #01
